sqlMap.statement: SELECT X.BjobBzwkDstcd , Y.BjobBzwkName , X.LnkgIPInfoName , X.LnkgPortInfoName, X.TCirtLnkgStusCd , X.THISMSGUSEYN , X.SysLnkgDstcd , X.OsidInstiDstcd , Z.OsidInstiName FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIBJ05 X INNER JOIN $schemaId$.TSEAIBJ02 Y ON X.BjobBzwkDstcd = Y.BjobBzwkDstcd LEFT OUTER JOIN $schemaId$.TSEAIBJ06 Z ON X.OsidInstiDstcd = Z.OsidInstiDstcd AND X.BjobBzwkDstcd = Z.BjobBzwkDstcd WHERE RqstRspnsDstcd = 'R' ORDER BY BjobBzwkDstcd, OsidInstiDstcd
